headline: ‘This piggy won’t be quiet’: They spent two nights on a bus to protest the president
summary: The "Remove the Regime" protest brought Ohio women to Washington D.C. via overnight buses to oppose Trump administration policies restricting reproductive and LGBTQ+ rights and attacking immigrants and rule of law; participants referenced the Epstein files controversy in signage, protested cuts to safety net programs like SNAP and Medicaid, and organizers plan sustained grassroots mobilization in conservative areas.
